analysis.key_quote: Moving career civil servants into a category of at-will employment makes those civil service positions vulnerable to political manipulation and influence, including by putting those employees at risk of termination should their efforts to uphold the federal oath of employment to defend the Constitution conflict with a political appointee's belief...
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, due process rights, and the integrity of the merit-based civil service system.
